title: Simulation of transient response of PID controller in an automated electro-pneumatic system using a single-acting cylinder in a clinical ventilator
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Samuel O. Amudipe, Joseph F. Kayode, Bernard A. Adaramola, Osafehinti J. Olatunbosun, Sunday A. Afolalu
